Player History

Earned first career win on 10/1/1986...

2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,078,571 through salary arbitration...

2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,192,857 through salary arbitration...
5/25/1990: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $3,190,000 per year, for 4 years.
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/1992, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
